report.title: Amazing, Wonderful, Legal
report.author: Jeff
report.bodytext: At approx.11:30a.m. I ingested 2,000 mg of phenibut xt bought from [website]. About 2 hours later I noticed myself feeling sedated and euphoric. I ingested another 2,000mg and went to work. At work my balance was obviously off, I felt completely messed up and goofy, singing and acting a fool. This stuff is great. It is pretty cheap, and it works wonders for social anxiety and insomnia.
